Tucson floors his gas pedal and pushes on at a rapid speed, even more so th=
an he was used to.  He was determined to get through the crisis and find Ro=
dimus.  His heart had shown him the way, and there was nothing anyone could=
 do to stop him.  With Vestige in his cab, he keeps careful watch over his =
newly found old friend, and secures him with a saftey belt around his shoul=
ders, to keep him safely in place on his seat.

"Hold on Vestige, the ride =
may get rough, but we will make it."

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Presto=

his power, as I too am not afraid to do the same. My heart is here for you,=
